text: I'm fuchsia Dunlop and I'm a cook and
food writer specializing in Chinese food
and I'm here today in the heart of
London's Chinatown it's been the center
of the Chinese community in London since
about the late 1940s and became official
Chinatown in 1984 and as you can see
it's home with red lanterns this was the
visit of the Chinese President to London
and all around me there are Chinese
lawyers acupuncturist massage and of
course many Chinese restaurants and
Chinatown's also the best place in
London really to buy really excellent
Chinese ingredients for cooking
